## What is Bounce
Bounce is an easy to use file sharing app compatible with macOS

## Features
- Connect to macOS devices and send/recive files to/from that device
- Easy to use
- Connect to anyone almost anywhere around the world (if you have their id)
- âˆž Unlimited File Upload Size
- Support for almost all file extensions

## Compatible Operating Systems

### macOS 13 (Ventura)
- ARM (Apple Silicon): Supported
- x86 || x64 (Intel): Unknown

## IMPORTANT NOTES
Please note that currently distributed app is not yet signed. This will cause a security alert to pop up on macOS. If you want to procced in using the application please follow the steps below.

## macOS
### macOS Ventura (13)
System Preferences -> Privacy and Security -> Scroll down and find the notification saying '"Bounce" was blocked from use because it is not from an identified developer' -> Open Anyway -> Open

## Tools Used
- Electron (v21.3.0)
- socket.io (v4.5.4)
- socket.io-stream (v0.9.1)
- socket.io-client (v4.5.4)
- python-shell (v3.0.1)
